title: Apple launches iPad Pro, Vision Pro and MacBook Pro with M5 chip
description: All three devices look identical to the current versions but swap out their processors for the company's first M5 chip, which provides improvements to computing speeds, graphics and artificial intelligence tasks, the company said.
content:
Apple Inc rolled out updated versions of the iPad Pro, Vision Pro and entry-level MacBook Pro with the new M5 chip, refreshing the products just ahead of the all-important holiday season.

title: "Will Increase Addiction And Loneliness"
description: He warned against developing artificial intelligence that is designed to emotionally or sexually influence human users.
content: Indian-origin Republican leader Vivek Ramaswamy on Wednesday voiced strong criticism against OpenAI's decision to introduce an "Adult Mode" in ChatGPT. He called it a "troubling" move that could lead to the sexual and emotional manipulation of users.... [2333 chars]

title: Vivo releases OriginOS 6 globally, bringing AI-driven design and smoother performance
description: Vivo unveils its new operating system, OriginOS 6, globally. This update brings significant advancements in artificial intelligence, user interface design, and system performance. Key features include the Origin Smooth Engine for enhanced responsiveness and vivo AI tools for seamless interactions. The OS also prioritizes user privacy and battery efficiency.

title: OpenAI Pivot to Porn Is Problematic
description: When you’re building artificial intelligence to benefit humanity, you might have to compromise. AI is expensive, so you raise billions of dollars from investors like Microsoft Corp, Nvidia Corp. and the United Arab Emirates. As you strive to build super-intelligent computers that will cure cancer, you also need to make money for your backers. description: Civil nuclear energy, artificial intelligence and new energy are among areas for more cooperation. Read more at straitstimes.com.
content:

title: Florida law targets using AI to ‘nudify’ people’s photos
description: A sweeping new Florida law that took effect Oct. 1 makes it illegal to produce sexual images of a person using artificial intelligence or similar technologies without their permission.
content:
A sweeping new Florida law that took effect Oct. 1 makes it illegal to produce sexual images of a person using artificial intelligence or similar technologies without their permission.
